title: ChatGPT-Enhanced Higher Education Mathematics Learning Design: A UTAUT-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: ChatGPT-based math problem-solving simulation via smartphones in limited-technology settings.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze multi-step mathematics problems of three or more levels and establish solution strategies using ChatGPT
Learners can improve technology acceptance by 20% or more utilizing the performance expectancy (PEE) and effort expectancy (EEC) factors of the UTAUT model
Learners can mathematically verify ChatGPT output results in VR-based simulations while maintaining error rates below 15%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
